com.epitech.utils

Class PasswordManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epitech.utils.PasswordManager

  • public class PasswordManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to encode or check hashed password with bcrypt crypto library.
    See Also:
    BCryptPasswordEncoder

      • encode

        public PasswordContainer encode(java.lang.String password)
        Encode the password with bcrypt alogrythms.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to encode/hash
        Returns:
        a String array with the salt and the hashed password respectively.

      • check

        public boolean check(java.lang.String password,
                     java.lang.String salt,
                     java.lang.String hash)
        This method is checking if the password given is parameter is valid relative to the hash and the salt.
        Parameters:
        password - the clear password to check.
        salt - the password salt.
        hash - the hashed password.
        Returns:
        a boolean that tell if the password is valid.
